# amalitech-docked-utility-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                                                |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | The default slot to be used with `amalitech-docked-utility-item` elements. |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                    | Description                                                        |
| --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--docked-utility-bar-border-top-color` | The color of the border at the top of the bar default is `#c1c4d6` |
| `--docked-utility-bg-color`             | The background color of the bar default is `#fff`                  |
